#Data

*In this lab you'll use data on code violations from Seattle's Open Data Portal, avaliable at:*

https://data.seattle.gov/Community/Code-Complaints-and-Violations/ez4a-iug7

You'll need to click export to download the data. Save as a CSV file to your machine, preferrably in your class folder.

```{r}
dat <- read.csv("Code_Complaints_and_Violations.csv")
dat2 <- read.csv("../Code_Complaints_and_Violations.csv")
dat3 <- read.csv("../Data/Code_Complaints_and_Violations.csv")

nrow(dat)
nrow(dat2)
nrow(dat3)

names(dat)
summary(dat)
```


#Where are these Reported From?

```{r}

table(dat$OriginalCity)

```


# What Type of Violations

```{r}
unique(dat$RecordTypeDesc)
table(dat$RecordTypeDesc)

```
